text: @WhiteHouse And explain - why White House staff admits they have been vaccinated? Vaccine takes 18 months to 4 years to develop. Does US has the Covid19 since 2018? And why US White House is not sharing the vaccine with fellow Americans and rather let them die! https://t.co/aiu40wDMLK
